verbs.description: [V: Responding] [ARG1: to U.S. President Donald Trump 's description of him as ' Animal Assad '] , [ARG0: the Syrian dictator] told pro - Putin news channel Russia Today : ' What you say is what you are ' .

[R-ARG0: Responding to U.S. President Donald Trump 's description of him as ' Animal Assad '] , [ARG0: the Syrian dictator] [V: told] [ARG2: pro - Putin news channel Russia Today] : ' [ARG1: What you say is what you are] ' .

Responding to U.S. President Donald Trump 's description of him as ' Animal Assad ' , the Syrian dictator told pro - Putin news channel Russia Today : ' [ARG1: What] [ARG0: you] [V: say] is what you are ' .

Responding to U.S. President Donald Trump 's description of him as ' Animal Assad ' , the Syrian dictator told pro - Putin news channel Russia Today : ' [ARG1: What you say] [V: is] [ARG2: what you are] ' .

Responding to U.S. President Donald Trump 's description of him as ' Animal Assad ' , the Syrian dictator told pro - Putin news channel Russia Today : ' What you say is [ARG2: what] [ARG1: you] [V: are] ' .
